topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Source code review

name: Numerology Calculator
short_description: According to numerology for each and every name there is a corresponding numerical value. This code produces the numerical value for the corresponding name. For example :Input:(username) = ramesh. Output: 2 + 1 + 4 + 5 + 3 + 5 = 20 ->2 + 0 = 2
